case.state: A game of poker should help me with my concentration.
What the heck? You look so much like me!
Hey your name is the same as- ugh!
(Something tells me this girl is bad news...)
Hey doesn't your dad own that burger chain? I love that place!
Shit, uh, be careful with that gun, ok?
I shouldn't be surprised with guns since detective prince Naoto uses one but that looks like bad news.
From what I've seen in pictures Scotland reminds me a bit of Inaba. It's neat to play against someone from there.
Wow, wrestling? Now that's something I gotta try!
You're good with your legs and yet our fightiing styles are different. What do you call yours?
Uh oh, not good.
I don't like the sound of this. Whenever someone wants to play, it almost never goes well...
Hey your name is the same as- ugh!
Gosh, it's so quiet in here. I kinda like it.
♫ Now I face out, I hold out, I reach out to the truth of my life, seeking to seize on the whole moment to now break away... ♪
Look at us! We could form our own basketball team!
Wah-- g-ghost!
W-wait! Why am I the only girl here?
Let's step on up to the plate!
I never back down from a challenge, so bring it on! Hwataa!
Haha, I'm sure this will be fun, like, I can't say why I was so repulsed about it back in high school. Don't worry about me.
The body is a temple. I will hone its mind.
C'mon, gimme ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifplural(s|)~ already!
~Cards.text~!! Hurry before she gets dirty ideas!
None for me! I can make this work.
Let's see... I'll exchange ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
This should be enough.
You know what to do, dealer!
I just need ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
All I need is a chance.. ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~!
Uhhh. ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifplural(s|)~.
How about ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifplural(s|)~?
I'm starting to get the hang of this.
Just like that!
Hey, Yuno, you’re great at card games, right? Is this hand good?
Not bad, a full house! I forget which one is better, a full house or flush...
Phew, still in it.
Just goes to show that I don't go down that easily!
It'll take more than that to bring me down!
I need a miracle...
Perfect! Just as I planned.
Perfect!
Will this be enough?
♫ Every day's great at your Junes! ♪ Aw, damn it, it's stuck in my head again.
Hm, if Naoto were here right now, she might have given me some pointers with her cardboard box tone. She's not one for friendly encouragement.
I've actually never gone to a kung fu dojo myself. I've mostly learned through imitating what I see on TV.
Nice! Gotta hand it to you, dealer.
Thanks, dealer! I owe you some steak for this.
Yes!
You know, you remind me of our navigator.
Nice hair! Short hair feels good, doesn't it?
This is fine. It should only get better from here.
The TV room in Junes is usually so empty that we could've played there instead.
This should be good enough to win, but I can't be too sure.
Two cards with the same number... if I remember correctly that's what I gotta go for.
Total disclaimer, I'm way more brawn than brains.
After this maybe I'll hit up the food court at Junes again.
Huh.
(I wonder if any of these guys have a worse hand.)
Okay, I can make this work.
It's like studying for an exam. You just need to not fail.
Maybe some filet mignon will do after this. It's got a great taste while still buffing you up.
You know, I was worried I'd have to go easy, but I'm glad you've been keeping up.
This'll be okay!
Hey, wait! He didn't say "Uno"!
Not good! Protect me, Tomoe!
Just girls? That's a relief. Nothing crazy today.
Don't think that I'm a guy just because my hair is short like yours.
No way!
Could it get any worse?
Now hold on a minute...
Where's Rise when you need her? Her supports always get us out of jams like this.
It's bad enough that I have to bare my underwear to the world.
Yeah, yeah, rub it in.
You're lucky I haven't completed my training yet, dealer!
Are you kidding? I can't let this be the end!
Oh shit...
I can't even bear to look...
I'm totally screwed now!
I can't afford to lose now!
There must be some way I can distract my opponent!
Well isn't that fantastic.
I'm gonna have some meat delivered. How do you guys want it prepared?
A street fighting circuit sounds awesome! You guys are regulars, aren't you? How's it like?
Wow, I've seen some pretty good dancing back in high school but this is something else!
Hearing this makes me want to dance all night again!
Probably best to not let it bother you. I was the only girl on the investigation team for a while so I'm used to it.
Petra, it's your birthday? Come meet us at Junes! We'll give you a nice treat!
Hey! You can't just team up like that!
You're an expert on technology aren't you, Futaba? Maybe you have a better idea than I do.
Honestly, without Tomoe I'd probably be toast. It's not that I can't hold my own but the shadows are ruthless.
You're referring to the ruins of Macho Pinchu aren't you? Or was it Mustard Pikachu?
My weapon? I always just use my fists. And maybe I'll have Tomoe help out, but mostly my fists... and legs...
The mark of the dragon! No? Maybe that's just a Neo Featherman thing.
A detective? Well Inaba's detective is Yu's uncle, so we know each other pretty well. As for his sidekick Adachi, well, I better save that story for another day.
Could it be that you know about the world inside our TVs, Colress?
When in doubt, play the soundtrack from Trial of the Dragon. I guarantee it'll get you rolling!
Can't say I like them. I'm more used to fighting them.
Just don't tell her about Mara... hey! Don't look it up either!
Oh yeah, that's definitely Kanji.
Yeah, if you want technology answers, you may want to ask Yosuke.
Great, it's King Moron's homeroom all over again.
Yukiko has been my friend for who knows how long? Probably goes back to childhood. Everyone on the team is worth protecting but she especially is someone I'll always hold dearly.
Come to think of it, I remember playing something similar. Tycoon was it?
What is this Triple Seven? Are they trying to compete with Junes? Seems like I better check it out.
Are you able to walk? I've never really seen Tokyo, but at least in Inaba, everything is close enough for us to walk to.
Maybe you could work out a bit more, but it's cute, Sayaka! Don't be afraid of it.
At least you don't seem dangerous. Not like any of the zombies that roam the TV world.
Nice jacket, Leonie! It feels good to tie it around your waist, doesn't it?
Come to think of it, you probably have enough battle experience to be my senpai. I hope some of your skill can rub off on me.
Who's George? Like George Washing-Machine whatever his name was? I know, I failed that world history exam hard.
Eheheh, this isn't normally what I do for fun, but I'll definitely do it again.
Never really expected card game players to be very fit anyway.
Who needs salt, anyway?
I like your attitude! You'll never know what you're gonna get so might as well be able to indulge in anything.
They have vegan meat now, don't they?
How about I order some rice balls instead? Or don't you guys call them donuts?
I'm gonna go with Playstation. Although I heard Teddie showed up in a Switch game. ...that was him, right?
Your name is actually Yusuke? My bad, I mistook you for someone else.
You're a police officer? On top of being a martial artist? I hope I can be like you some day.
Our leader became pretty famous on the internet for his dance accompanied by sax music. Perhaps you've heard of it? It's called Specialist.
Oh yeah, King Moron is what we call our homeroom teacher Mr. Morooka. He really is a moron.
The world you fight in sounds oddly similar to our shadow world. But if you don't have personas, what could you be using?
I'm getting bad vibes about Cammy. It's almost as if there's some dark power controlling her...
(She'd make for a great freind too...)
Oh no you don't, Naga. I see you trying to peek at my hand.
You're a navi, right? I'm a little jealous of your skills. Eh, don't tell Rise I said that.
Doesn't seem like the Midnight Channel will be on tonight.
I sense some powerful energy. Another persona user?
You're not from around here, are you? What's it like where you come from?
I used to play trumpet once! Why don't we do a duet together?
Sorry, I kinda had a word vomit there. Just never expected to see a ghost for real, you know?
Go ahead and celebrate, Ryuji. But next round will be my turn, just you wait.
Ehehe, I just hope I don't burn the inventory down!
Wait, we're doing teams now? In that case, I'm team dragon!
Hardy har har...
Yeah yeah, rub it in.
You mean like a meatball combo? Yeah those are always nice.
A combo? Is that the supposed baton pass I've heard about?
I almost got away with it too! You and your meddling hands.
Variety? Oh, that just comes down to different seasonings and which animal the meat is coming from.
Yeah, it's usually based on seasoning and different animals. Wait, you guys don't have seasoning over there?
Yep, that's me, a real butt kicker. Hahaha... ha...
You're too kind, Kuma.
(Leonie's watching. I hope I can impress her.)
Ready, Leonie? I'll show you I'm not just all bark and no bite.
Oh, shove it.
Whatever, try and stop me a second time.
Again? Fine, have it your way.
(Come on, Chie, pull it together!)
Can't be all bad, since you guys showed yours first.
Oh, my turn? No problem!
This is starting to get tense! I'm on the edge of my seat!
Well, it was going to be my turn sooner or later.
My turn, huh? Just watch.
Kept me waiting long enough.. not that I was looking forward to it or anything.
After this I won't be taking any more off... I hope.
Oh geez, I don't have anything smaller to take off.
Don't feel too bad about it. I would have done it sooner, but that was against the rules.
We've reached that point, huh? Well then, it's now or never.
Well, it was going to be my turn sooner or later.
Oh geez, I don't have anything smaller to take off.
I have... no comment.
Huh? Are you sure? That soon?
No way!
I lost! So that means...
When training, it's important to keep it slow, but not so slow that you don't go anywhere.
We've reached that point huh? Well then, it's now or never.
W-wait, before I show them, let me prepare myself first.
Don't feel too bad about it. I would have done it sooner, but that was against the rules.
How is that even possible?
And after such a good hand too!
I thought I was in the clear!
Are you guys rigging the deck?
Seriously?
No, this can't be!
You owe me 10 meat buns for this!
How stupid do you think I am?
What am I doing? I need to somehow change my strategy.
Maybe I really am this stupid, geez..
My mom did say I needed to work on my brain.
Not even a meat bun can cheer me up..
Dammit, how can I be a police officer if I can't even outlast these opponents?
(Why did this have to happen so soon?)
It feels weird doing this in front of you, Sayaka.
You know, Leonie, now that I've got a good look, your shoes look pretty clunky. How do you fight in those?
Moon, I swear to god...
Geez, Moon, it's hard enough for me to do this without you being a super perv.
Got any of those visors, Oracle? I may not be able to show my face after this...
(It's weird, I've been around this ghost for so long, and yet I don't even seem that scared.)

In this corner, from the sleepy town of Inaba, the carnivore who discarded womanhood, Chie Satonaka!
(I gotta think of a better introduction.)
Wrestling is so cool! I used to watch an American league called W.T.F. and tried immitating the moves.
(I just can't with this girl...)
You're such a tease Futaba, the way you stare at us with those big eyes, how you comment like we're hentai characters...
I wish I had abs like yours, Leonie. What's your secret?
Being out here reminds me of the time I slept in my jacket during a camping trip. Normally the tents are split by gender, but Kanji took over my tent.
See? If I can do it you can too.
I still can't believe you guys work with a talking cat thing.
Man! I barely understand how this game works. All I know about cards I learned from Steel Fists, but that scene was so boring I almost fell asleep!
You know, there was this poker scene in this movie I like! But it totally turns into a big fight scene! Hahahaha! Haha! Heehhhh....
Just so you know, these spatz aren't for your enjoyment!
Are there any tall tales about the inventory? We've got plenty of those about Inaba, like the story of the girl who forgot her homework and in the bathroom mirror she saw...
Dammit, I was hoping it wouldn't come to this.
At least I didn't bring my Neo Featherman tank.
I don't have abs like some of the other fighters, but I hope this is good enough.
This is it. No turning back.
I can't believe I'm really doing this...
G-get ready everyone, this will blow you away, hahaha…
I hope you're ready, because I'm wearing one of my favorite outfits underneath.
Look, if you have a problem just tell me.
Hey, this isn't so bad after all! Never mind on that visor.
(Of course! I managed to overcome my fear of ghosts, so I can overcome embarassing myself too!)
Alright, Mika! Hope you're ready because I'm bringing the heat! Come forth, Tomoe!
Yeah, I know it's scripted, but who cares? Nothing like an RKO to send your enemy flying! Just like an anime!
But you know what? That's what I like about you. You're the type of person I can hang out with, even if it starts out awkward.
Great, now there's sand all over me.
We would have been caught by our chaperone King Moron if not for Yosuke sweet talking his way out of it.
I still don't get the appeal...
Well, now you don't have to keep hounding me about it.
But maybe it's not too farfetched since we have a talking bear on our team.
...maybe you were the cause of it, since you're a ghost after all, heh.
Don't even think about it boys.
Maybe I should have gone with boxers.
...aw man, I can't bring myself to think about it. Ghost stories are too much for me.
Actually, I'm liking how free my legs feel.
So, u-um, how does my underwear look?

(If I bring up a conversation maybe it'll keep the others from noticing.)
So, did anyone catch the new Neo Featherman episode last night?
Could someone at least turn up the heat?
I-It's not like this is anything out of the ordinary, right?
Maybe I should have thought twice before I took off my shoes in a place like this.
Now I'm all warmed up! Let's start the training for real!
See? I can handle it... I hope.
Shouldn't make a difference whether my shoes are off right?
Alright, so far so good.
C-c'mon, say something! You're making me all embarassed!
(No one's laughing. That's good.)
(Hey, I actually pulled it off! Nice! What else can I do?)
It's my dancing outfit! I wore this when I helped Risette the idol with her comeback concert.
Bring it on, Yosu- I mean Yusuke!
Looks like you're up, Ryuji! As the athlete of your group, you gotta give it your all and not look back!
For someone with a pirate persona you sure aren't liking these dirty things.
Quite an interesting dialect there, Brock. Certainly not from one of those smaller scale areas like Inaba.
(Oh no, ~name~ is the last person we want nude...)
So, is anyone going to stop ~name~ or are we just going to let him run wild?
I mean, if you want to I guess...
Score one for me!
And I live to see another round...
Whenever you're ready!
Wow, you suck at this!
If you want to survive, you have to give it your all.
(They just have to keep knocking each other out.)
Remember your training, ~name~!
Whatever you do, don't cross the line. I can tell when you get there.
No touching OK?
Don't be scared now, ~name~.
Not like I have anything to lose at this point. I'm ready to let loose... That sounded better in my head.
Just pretend we're all in our underwear. Oh, wait a minute...
You should have done it while I still had clothes on!
Did someone lose? Hell if I can notice.
Nice! Take it off, ~name~!
Don't hold back, ~name~!
Well? We're waiting.
Better luck next time!
Here's my victory pose!
Your turn! Show us what you're made of.
What will it be, ~name~?
Alright, it's your time to strip, ~name~.
Did ya see that? I practically blew them away! Well, maybe that's not possible in a card game, haha! Hehhhh...
(Oh no, ~name~ is the last person we want nude...)
So, is anyone going to stop ~name~ or are we just going to let her run wild?
H-hey! What was that just now? Are you some kind of wizard? ...No, that can't be.
Yeah, don't mention it...
This early? Are you serious?!
That's gotta be against the rules!
You're really crossing the line!
Ugh...
Don't even think about it!
Looks like you're down to your chest, Haru. Are you excited?
(Haru's so ladylike, almost like Yukiko rubbed off on her... oh god I think I have a type.)
She's insane! Who let her in here?
Show us what you got, Futaba!
You're up Leonie! Show us your warrior skills!
I've been waiting for this! Take it away, Leonie!
Interesting. How does a ghost strip? I always figured clothes went right through them anyway.
You barely wear any clothes to begin with so you better not dissappoint!
You're up, but don't try any funny business, Naga.
You're up again! Honestly I never expected you to get this far!
Seeing you not get flustered and freak out sure is a nice change of pace.
Not to be nosy, Aoba, but what's the story on that Fighting Street remake? It's been delayed for over a year now.
Hey, Aoba, I saw the photo of the Fairy Story dev team and doesn't your coworker look a lot like me? That Hajime girl?
Want some help, ~name~?
If anyone messes with you I'll be sure to kick their ass!
C'mon officer! Do something!
Better luck next time!
Here's my victory pose!
Your turn! Show us what you're made of.
What will it be, ~name~?
Alright, it's your time to strip, ~name~.
Did ya see that? I practically blew them away! Well, maybe that's not possible in a card game, haha! Hehhhh...
No touching, OK?
Don't be scared now, ~name~.
Not like I have anything to lose at this point. I'm ready to let loose... That sounded better in my head.
I mean, if you want to I guess...
Score one for me!
And I live to see another round...
Whenever you're ready!
Wow, you suck at this!
If you want to survive, you have to give it your all.
(They just have to keep knocking each other out.)
Remember your training, ~name~!
Whatever you do, don't cross the line. I can tell when you get there.
Just pretend we're all in our underwear. Oh, wait a minute...
A tie! What are the odds of that?
A tie? So what happens now?
Hey, watch it!
Are you trying to get us killed?
Now you're just playing dirty, ~name~.
Oh, come on! After how far we've come?
Maybe I underestimated you, ~name~,
Pssh...
Well at least someone's got dignity.
Not taking off your ~clothing~ first? I need to do that.
Your ~clothing~ looks nice.
You're only taking off your ~clothing~?
I've never been a fashion expert, but I think you look better without that anyway.
Not going to lie, I'm pretty pissed.
I'm not the happiest right now, but I need to be able to control my emotions.
You sure are full of energy! I wish I could emulate that.
They say slow and steady wins the race, don't they?
Insulting! I feel like I'm on the Midnight Channel.
You owe me for this.
Scared? Don't be. You'll only be delaying the inevitable.
Um, yeah let's move on.
All part of my training.
Phew, I was worried you were going to take things too quickly.
Hurry up and start the next round!
That's it, then? Nothing else?
I should have expected that.
H-hey! What're you looking at me for?
I should probably take this time to get a pork bun-- oh wait, never mind. We gotta start the next round.
I'll forgive you if you buy me steak.
Protect me, Tomoe!
Everyone, stand behind me!
Who needs weapons when you can fight with your bare hands? Hwataa!
Guess I can't complain.
Well at least someone's got dignity.
Your ~clothing~ looks nice.
Just you wait. I'll get you further than that.
Finally ditching your ~clothing~?
Are you really dragging things out like this?
How stupid do you think we are?
Smart move. I can't stay mad forever.
I'm not the happiest right now, but I need to be able to control my emotions.
OK, maybe I'm a little pissed.
You're only taking off your ~clothing~?
I've never been a fashion expert, but I think you look better without that anyway.
You just wanted to see me naked didn't you?
You owe me filet mignon for this!
Scared? Don't be. You'll only be delaying the inevitable.
Um, yeah let's move on.
All part of my training.
Phew, I was worried you were going to take things too quickly.
Hurry up and start the next round!
That's it, then? Nothing else?
I should have expected that.
H-hey! What're you looking at me for?
I should probably take this time to get a pork bun-- oh wait, never mind. We gotta start the next round.
I'll forgive you if you buy me steak.
Do personas have long backstories like that? Mine came when I defeated my shadow inside a TV.
Shield your eyes, girls!
Let's face it. You were removing that sooner or later.
We're finally getting somewhere, ~name~.
It's about time.
We've gotten this far. I can't really complain.
Can't you do more than that, ~name~?
About damn time.
Your ~clothing~, huh? Nice.
Your ~clothing~, gotcha.
You're trying to outlast me, but I'll wear you down, ~name~.
You've underestimated my training, ~name~!
With how slow you're going I should order some filet.
~Clothing~? Is that it?
Just goes to show I can never rely on boys to give me stuff to work with.
You need to work your legs more! A little kung fu should do the trick!
There's only so many witty remarks I can make.
What to do now...
Now that you've lost those clothes, your body should be more free to move around!
We're moving on, right?
I like my odds.
Well, there's always next round.
Probably doesn't matter. I'm already focused on the next round.
(Yawn) I forgot, when did I last eat?
At this rate, I'll have a good chance at winning!
Oh well, I like a bit of competiition!
Show us more of that, next round.
If this was a race, you'd be in a pathetic placement!
Next round, do us a favor and take off something better.
Probably doesn't matter. I'm already focused on the next round.
The sooner we start the next round, the sooner I can get dinner!
How about an all-you-can-eat buffet at Junes?
No way! I thought only Teddie could morph between a human and animal! Then again, he is a mascot so I guess it's not too out there.
So it works like your persona? I can see that.
Sheesh...
Nice spats, Bern! Fitting for another warrior like yourself.
What's up with your clothes anyway? Is it some weird shadow world gimmick?
Just thinking about walking in heels makes me cringe.
Don't worry about it. We're in a locker room after all.
Don't worry about it. Just pretend it's the girls locker room.
Let's face it. You were removing that sooner or later.
We're finally getting somewhere, ~name~.
It's about time.
About damn time.
I mean you do have to lose the clothes before getting to the good stuff.
Your ~clothing~, gotcha.
Yeah that's it. You're almost there...
You've underestimated my training, ~name~!
With how slow you're going I should order some filet.
We've gotten this far. I can't really complain.
Can't you do more than that, ~name~?
~Clothing~? Is that it?
This is getting tense. I better brace myself! Tomoe!!

pfft
This girl is quite the handful. Is she always like this?
You could do what I do and wrap it around your waist! Then again, it probably messes with your ladylike charms.
Hate to dissapoint, Moon, but you won't be losing on my watch! Wait, what am I saying?
Look out for that shadow, Saya--! Oh, wait, it's leaving.
Sorry, I can call you Bern, right?
Next round, do us a favor and take off something better.
Probably doesn't matter. I'm already focused on the next round.
The sooner we start the next round the sooner I can get dinner!
How about an all you can eat buffet at Junes?
Show us more of that, next round.
You're such a tease!
There's only so many witty remarks I can make.
What to do now...
Now that you've lost those clothes, your body should be more free to move around!
We're moving on, right?
I like my odds.
Well, there's always next round.
Probably doesn't matter. I'm already focused on the next round.
(Yawn) I forgot, when did I last eat?
At this rate, I'll have a good chance at winning!
Oh well, I like a bit of competiition!
It can't bother me if I look away...
Time sure flies. We already got to your ~clothing~.
(I never expected ~name~ to look good almost-naked...)
Hey, take your time if you need to.
Should I look? You trust me, right?
What was I so worried about again?
Looks like you're running out of options, ~name~.
It's the point of no return!
Just a day at the beach... Yeah, I'll go with that!
(Remember your training, Chie. You're here to improve your concentration.)
Not bad, but the game's still going.
Not bad, but you're almost out of options.
I have... no comment.
If I'm going to be a police officer, I'll have to get used to this sight. I may be responsible for stripping suspects down and searching for drugs.
I've got my eye on you, ~name~.
Nice view...
Now that's more like it!
You know what's next right?
Hey! You can't use your, uh, persona thingie to get you clothes! Otherwise this will never end!
(What could she be talking about?)
We're not going to jail for this, are we?
(If I see a wire, that's my cue to bounce!)
Moon, I swear to god...
Leave ~player~ alone, Naga. What did they ever do to you?
It's the point of no return!
Maybe if I take it off like that, Yukiko will be impressed!
(I never expected ~name~ to look good almost-naked...)
What was I so worried about again?
Looks like you're running out of options, ~name~.
It can't bother me if I look away...
Time sure flies. We already got to your ~clothing~.
Hey, take your time if you need to.
Should I look? You trust me, right?
It's your funeral dude.
Just pretend we're in the locker room together!
Oh-- well, nothing to worry about in that case. Back to the game, haha!
H-huh? What's gotten into you Haru?
Wait, Haru? What on earth is up with you?
O-okay, let's calm down for a second now.
Is this the Midnight Channel? Am I seeing your shadow, Haru?
She's a persona user! Wait, actually... never mind.
Hey, don't look at me. I'm no expert.
It'd be way worse if you didn't.
Actually, no, if you weren't wearing anything underneath, that'd mean you were trying to play us from the beginning.
Do you have any of that in green?
Maybe green eagles will be more your style?
How would I look in that? I've been meaning to change up my look and I mostly have green clothes.
Don't get me wrong, I can like a nude body as much as the next girl, but your quips are enough to offset it.
I wish I had abs like yours, Leonie. What's your secret?
So you do have gym class! I hope you're taking advantage of it.
Now that's more like it!
You know what's next right?
(Remember your training, Chie. You're here to improve your concentration.)
Not bad, but the game's still going.
Not bad, but you're almost out of options.
I have... no comment.
If I'm going to be a police officer, I'll have to get used to this sight. I may be responsible for stripping suspects down and searching for drugs.
I've got my eye on you, ~name~.
Nice view...
Rise had no problem getting in her bikini for that commercial. You could learn a lot from her.
Everyone, get down behind me!
Tomoe, take out that rocket- oh, too late...
You actually like this stuff?
H-hey! My chest is way better than these guys'!
W-well maybe I should show you some kung fu movies! It's not supposed to be a problem.
It's a good thing you didn't. Otherwise I may have galactic punted you out of here!
People go shirtless in kung fu movies all the time.
